data.title: UltraNest: Pythonic Nested Sampling Development Framework and UltraNest
data.name: UltraNest
data.description: Fit and compare complex models reliably and rapidly. Advanced nested sampling.

evidence: Owner is a GitHub user account `JohannesBuchner` and README says “If you require another license, please contact me.” indicating personal maintenance rather than institutional governance.
README describes it as a Python package: “pip and conda installable” and provides an API reference, implying it is imported and used as a library in other code.

README states it “implements a Monte Carlo technique called nested sampling” and is “intended for fitting complex physical models with slow likelihood evaluations,” directly performing Bayesian inference for research analyses.
